World Baseball Classic participant (2013) }} 'Joseph "Joe" Patrick Mauer' (born
April 19, 1983) is an American baseball catcher in Major League Baseball (MLB)
for the Minnesota Twins. He is the only catcher in MLB history to win
three batting titles. He also won three consecutive Gold Glove awards
(2008â2010), and the 2009 American League (AL) Most Valuable Player (MVP)
Award.
